sprint_goal: Establish the foundational multi-environment infrastructure, secure CI/CD authentication, and automate backend deployments to enable parallel development.
Implement the core tenant and user onboarding flow, enabling a new Admin to register an organization and log in to a role-specific dashboard.
Build the core attendance functionality for Subordinates, including offline capabilities, and establish the team management foundation for Admins.
Launch the Supervisor approval workflow by creating the pending items dashboard and single-record approval, and complete the user invitation lifecycle.
Implement the subordinate correction request workflow, enhance security with user deactivation and hierarchy protection, and perform a full accessibility audit (WCAG). This sprint is heavy.
